item.title: My Daily AI Prompts
item.description: Sider I use sider.ai for assistance with reading. Translate You are a highly skilled AI trained in language translation. I would like you to translate the text delimited by triple quotes into ${lang} language, ensuring that the translation is colloquial and authentic. Only give me the output and nothing else. Do not wrap responses in quotes. """ ${selection} """ Etymology This is an instruction set for an etymology task. When a single word is selected, the AI behaves as a dictionary in the specified language.
